Event: The person is experiencing negative emotions and thoughts on Halloween and birthdays due to feelings of loneliness, disappointment, and low self-esteem. They also mention having suicidal thoughts and plan to end their life on New Year's Eve.

This post displays a stable attributional style because it attributes the cause of the person's negative emotions and thoughts to their inherent nature, rather than to external factors. It suggests that the person is naturally prone to feeling down and has low self-esteem, and that these feelings are not temporary or situational, but rather a permanent part of who they are.
